description: This file contains unit tests for the DataElement and related classes within the WPEFramework Core namespace, leveraging Google Test framework to validate data manipulation, copying, searching, and parsing functionalities.

classes.name: DataElement
classes.description: Represents a data element with methods for copying, CRC calculation, search, and manipulation.

classes.name: DataStore
classes.description: A data container with sizing and buffer access methods.

classes.name: LinkedDataElement
classes.description: Represents a linked data element with capabilities for chained/linked data management.

classes.name: DataElementParser
classes.description: Parses DataElement instances with methods for validation and skipping bytes.

methods.name: Copy
methods.description: Copies data into the DataElement object.

methods.name: Size
methods.description: Retrieves or sets the size of the DataStore or DataElement.

methods.name: Buffer
methods.description: Accesses the underlying buffer of the DataStore or DataElement.

methods.name: SearchNumber
methods.description: Searches for a number within the DataElement.

methods.name: SetNumber
methods.description: Sets a number at a specified position.

methods.name: GetNumber
methods.description: Retrieves a number from a specified position.

methods.name: Set
methods.description: Sets a value at a specified offset.

methods.name: Align
methods.description: Aligns data to a specific boundary.

methods.name: Enclosed
methods.description: Sets or gets enclosed linked data.

methods.name: LinkedSize
methods.description: Returns the size of linked data.

methods.name: LinkedElements
methods.description: Returns the number of linked data elements.

methods.name: SkipBytes
methods.description: Skips a specified number of bytes in a parser.
